ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Velious first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: It s /wincolor. Also, before the patch yesterday the Inven screen could have a transparent poly background (got removed by accident maybe?) and the Inspection
ygData.messageBody:
It's /wincolor.

Also, before the patch yesterday the Inven screen could have a transparent poly background (got removed by accident maybe?) and the Inspection box appeared in the middle of the screen with a poly background. If you notice on the inspection box, there's an itty-bitty black square in the upper left side of it...I'm assuming that's for moving it around like the other ones. The only problem is that the window is only up when you're inspecting something, and you can't click on the square. I'm sure they'll fix both problems in a patch soon.

Looks like the Coldain city will be the best Tradeskill city around (or at least to park a porter mule at). In the Exchange (the bank), there's about 8 different trade skill merchants, and there's merchant throughout the rest of the city for all the trade skills 'cept Tinkering (or at least, I didn't see one).

My impression of Velious so far: amazing

>>> Donny Dane<ddane01@...> 12/07/00 09:52PM >>>
/windowcolor chat <r><g><b><t> is the command, i think
